Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.board

Class Board

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.observer.Observable
it.polimi.ingsw.model.board.Board
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class Board
extends Observable
implements java.io.Serializable
This class represents the board used to play the game. It is a 5x5 matrix of Space.
See Also:
Serialized Form

    Board()

  • Method Details

    • restoreBoard

      public void restoreBoard​(Space[][] spaces)
      Restore the board from file.
      Parameters:
      spaces - Spaces saved on file.

    • initWorkers

      public void initWorkers​(java.util.List<Worker> workers)
      Sets the workers on the board at the worker position. This method should be called only on game start.
      Parameters:
      workers - a list of workers.

    • getWorkerByPosition

      public Worker getWorkerByPosition​(Position position)
      Returns a worker given the position argument.
      Parameters:
      position - the position of the worker.
      Returns:
      the worker found, null otherwise.

    • getFreePositions

      public java.util.List<Position> getFreePositions()
      Returns the free positions on the board.
      Returns:
      the free positions on the board.

    • arePositionsFree

      public boolean arePositionsFree​(java.util.List<Position> positionList)
      Check if positionList refers only to free spaces.
      Parameters:
      positionList - positionList from client.
      Returns:
      true if all the positions in the argument list are free, false otherwise.

    • getSpace

      public Space getSpace​(Position position)
      Returns the space at the given position.
      Parameters:
      position - position of a Space.
      Returns:
      the Space at the given Position.

    • getSpace

      public Space getSpace​(int row, int col)
      Returns the space at the given coordinates (row, column).
      Parameters:
      row - the row of the Space.
      col - the column of the Space.
      Returns:
      the Space at the given coordinates.

    • getNextSpaceInLine

      public Space getNextSpaceInLine​(Position orig, Position dest)
      Return the next Space on the line passing between orig and dest.
      Parameters:
      orig - the starting position.
      dest - the destination position.
      Returns:
      the next Space on the line passing between orig and dest, null if the next Space on the line is invalid. getNextPositionInLine(Position, Position).

    • getNextPositionInLine

      public Position getNextPositionInLine​(Position orig, Position dest)
      Return the next position on the line passing between orig and dest.
      Parameters:
      orig - the starting position.
      dest - the destination position.
      Returns:
      the next position on the line passing between orig and dest.

    • isPositionOnBoard

      public boolean isPositionOnBoard​(Position position)
      Checks if the given position is on the board.
      Parameters:
      position - the position to be checked.
      Returns:
      true if the position is on the board, false otherwise. isPositionOnBoard(int, int).

    • isPositionOnBoard

      public boolean isPositionOnBoard​(int row, int col)
      Checks if the given position is on the board.
      Parameters:
      row - the row the position to be checked.
      col - the column of the position to be checked.
      Returns:
      true if the position is on the board, false otherwise.

    • getNeighbours

      public java.util.List<Position> getNeighbours​(Position position)
      Returns a list of positions that are adjacent to the position argument.
      Parameters:
      position - The position to look for the neighbours.
      Returns:
      The list of spaces adjacent to this space.

    • getNeighbourWorkers

      public java.util.List<Position> getNeighbourWorkers​(Position position, boolean oppOnly)
      Returns a list of positions that are adjacent to the position argument and are occupied by a worker.
      Parameters:
      position - The position to look for the neighbours.
      oppOnly - If set to true only opponent workers are checked.
      Returns:
      The list of spaces adjacent to this space.

    • getMoveTypeByLevel

      public MoveType getMoveTypeByLevel​(Position orig, Position dest)
      Returns the MoveType needed to perform the move from the first position argument to the second position argument. Comparison is done by checking the current levels of the spaces. Returns null if the arguments are not neighbours.
      Parameters:
      orig - the starting position.
      dest - the destination position.
      Returns:
      the MoveType needed to perform the move from the first position argument to the second position argument. Returns null if the arguments are not neighbours or if the origin position is the same as the destination.

    • resetAllLevels

      public void resetAllLevels()
      Resets all the spaces' levels and domes in the board.

    • getReducedSpaceBoard

      public ReducedSpace[][] getReducedSpaceBoard()
      Returns a matrix of ReducedSpace which is animmutable object.
      Returns:
      a board of reduced spaces

    • moveWorker

      public void moveWorker​(Worker worker, Position dest)
      Moves a worker to the given Position. Finally, a notification to the views is sent.
      Parameters:
      worker - the worker to be moved.
      dest - the destination of the move.

    • swapWorkers

      public void swapWorkers​(Worker worker1, Worker worker2)
      Swaps the position of two workers in the board. Finally, a notification to the views is sent.
      Parameters:
      worker1 - the first worker.
      worker2 - the second worker.

    • buildBlock

      public void buildBlock​(Worker worker, Position dest)
      Builds a single block over the Space at the given position.
      Parameters:
      worker - the worker who builds.
      dest - the space position to build onto.

    • buildDomeForced

      public void buildDomeForced​(Worker worker, Position dest)
      Builds a dome over the Space at the given position. Level checks are bypassed.
      Parameters:
      worker - the worker who builds.
      dest - the space position to build onto.

    • getSpaces

      public Space[][] getSpaces()
      Returns a matrix of the board spaces.
      Returns:
      a matrix of spaces.
